mapper.select: SELECT id,name,address,station,floor_plan_id AS floorPlanId,building_date AS buildingDate,status FROM mansion
SELECT id,name,address,station,floor_plan_id AS floorPlanId,building_date AS buildingDate,status AS status FROM mansion WHERE id=#{id}

SELECT id,name,address,station,floor_plan_id AS floorPlanId,building_date AS buildingDate,status AS status FROM mansion WHERE status=#{status}
AND building_date = #{buildingDate}

SELECT id,name,address,station,floor_plan_id AS floorPlanId,building_date AS buildingDate,status AS status FROM mansion WHERE id IN
#{idList}
SELECT id,name,address,station,floor_plan_id AS floorPlanId,building_date AS buildingDate,status AS status FROM mansion WHERE station LIKE #{station}
SELECT m.id,m.name,f.floor_plan_name FROM mansion m INNER JOIN floor_plan f ON m.floor_plan_id=f.id WHERE m.id=#{id}
